text: puokke ban chhlaey tha mean pitabrakd men . anak dasatuen promean pitchea ban mokadl puok yeung men bo nde puok yeung ban bde- se th . haey puok yeung ban niyeay tha a l laoh minban banhchouh avei b ndi ch mk laey . puok anak(anakneasar ning anak ruom chomnue cheamuoy keat) kmeanoavei krawpi sthet knong pheap v nge v ng da sen chhngay noh laey
